item.title: TIL: Creating a new file or folder in NerdTree
item.description: To create a new file or folder in NerdTree, bring up the NerdTree menu by typing m. This brings up a multiple options including: (a)dd a childnode (m)ove the current node (d)elete the current node (r)eveal in Finder the current node (o)pen the current node with system editor (q)uicklook the current node (c)opy the current node (l)ist the current node So now you press a and can type in the file name or the folder that you want to create.
